properties.name: noLabelFloat
properties.description:
Set to true to disable the floating label. The label disappears when the input value is
not null.

properties.name: alwaysFloatLabel
properties.description: Set to true to always float the floating label.

properties.name: attrForValue
properties.description: The attribute to listen for value changes on.

properties.name: autoValidate
properties.description: Set to true to auto-validate the input value when it changes.

properties.name: invalid
properties.description:
True if the input is invalid. This property is set automatically when the input value
changes if auto-validating, or when the `iron-input-validate` event is heard from a child.

properties.name: focused
properties.description: True if the input has focus.

methods.name: updateAddons
methods.description: Call this to update the state of add-ons.
